variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (10,11,12) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || ' - Q1'
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (1,2,3) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || ' - Q2'
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (4,5,6) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) || ' - Q3'
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (7,8,9) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || ' - Q4'
ELSE NULL
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") ||'-' || MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT")
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") ||'-0' || MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT")
--- ADD one Year if we are already in CW 1 at the end of December
+ CASE WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") = 12 AND CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT") = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
|| '-CW-' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT")
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || '-CW-0' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH( "EKKO"."AEDAT" ) >= 10
THEN CASE
WHEN DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
END
ELSE CASE
WHEN DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
END
END

variables.name: filter6
variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END

variables.name: filter7
variables.value:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("EKPO"."LOEKZ") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'S' THEN 'locked'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'L' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "EKPO"."LOEKZ"
END

variables.name: activities_used_in_automation_rate
variables.value: 'Create Purchase Requisition Item','Change Price','Create Purchase Order Item','Receive Order Confirmation','Record Invoice Receipt','Record Goods Receipt','Delete Purchase Order Item','Release Purchase Order','Refuse Purchase Order','Cancel Invoice Receipt','Change Quantity','Cancel Goods Receipt','Block Purchase Order Item','Send Overdue Notice','Reactivate Purchase Order Item','Dun Order Confirmation'

meta.expressionLhs: CASE WHEN ( CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Record Goods Receipt' THEN CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Send Purchase Order' THEN CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Send Purchase Order' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Goods Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) ELSE CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Purchase Order Item' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Goods Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) END ELSE CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Send Purchase Order' THEN CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Send Purchase Order' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Invoice Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) ELSE CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Purchase Order Item' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Invoice Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) END END ) / "EKPO"."PLIFZ" < 0.5 THEN 'e) Ratio < 50%' WHEN ( CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Record Goods Receipt' THEN CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Send Purchase Order' THEN CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Send Purchase Order' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Goods Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) ELSE CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Purchase Order Item' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Goods Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) END ELSE CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Send Purchase Order' THEN CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Send Purchase Order' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Invoice Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) ELSE CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Purchase Order Item' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Invoice Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) END END ) / "EKPO"."PLIFZ" BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8 THEN 'd) Ratio between 50% and 80%' WHEN ( CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Record Goods Receipt' THEN CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Send Purchase Order' THEN CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Send Purchase Order' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Goods Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) ELSE CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Purchase Order Item' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Goods Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) END ELSE CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Send Purchase Order' THEN CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Send Purchase Order' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Invoice Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) ELSE CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Purchase Order Item' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Invoice Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) END END ) / "EKPO"."PLIFZ" BETWEEN 0.8 AND 1.2 THEN 'c) Ratio between 80% and 120%' WHEN ( CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Record Goods Receipt' THEN CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Send Purchase Order' THEN CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Send Purchase Order' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Goods Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) ELSE CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Purchase Order Item' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Goods Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) END ELSE CASE WHEN PROCESS # 'Send Purchase Order' THEN CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Send Purchase Order' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Invoice Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) ELSE CALC_THROUGHPUT ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Purchase Order Item' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Record Invoice Receipt' ] , REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , DAYS ) ) END END ) / "EKPO"."PLIFZ" BETWEEN 1.2 AND 1.5 THEN 'b) Ratio between 120% and 150%' ELSE 'a) Ratio > 150%' END AS "Lead Time Ratio"

axis0.name: Lead Time Ratio
axis0.text:
CASE 
    WHEN KPI("Case_Leadtime_Actual") / "EKPO"."PLIFZ" < 0.5 THEN 'e) Ratio < 50%'
    WHEN KPI("Case_Leadtime_Actual") / "EKPO"."PLIFZ" BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8 THEN 'd) Ratio between 50% and 80%'
    WHEN KPI("Case_Leadtime_Actual") / "EKPO"."PLIFZ" BETWEEN 0.8 AND 1.2 THEN 'c) Ratio between 80% and 120%'
    WHEN KPI("Case_Leadtime_Actual") / "EKPO"."PLIFZ" BETWEEN 1.2 AND 1.5 THEN 'b) Ratio between 120% and 150%'
    ELSE 'a) Ratio > 150%'
END
